Articles.Content:
Relatively new here.

I have been playing KSP for a little over a month now and have fallen in love with it. My interest in space has been renewed and for that alone I am thankful. I am very excited with where KSP is headed thanks to SQUAD.

Now, I'm off to finish preparing my return trip from Eve's surface.

Edited May 24, 2014 by cwhiz

If you succeed in bringing a ship back from Eve I am going to be angry, because I've been playing for two years and haven't been able to do that yet.

Meanwhile, welcome to the forum.
Indeed, a return trip from eve is a noteworthy venture. Would love to see some pic's, even (especially) if it doesn't go to plan . Welcome to the forum and may you smite the kraken on your travels.

Indeed, a return trip from eve is a noteworthy venture. Would love to see some pic's, even (especially) if it doesn't go to plan . Welcome to the forum and may you smite the kraken on your travels.

Thanks for the greetings madhat and Vanamonde.

I hadn't thought about documenting the journey madhat but since you mention it I will remember to take some screens.
